use_cases_desc:
Sending files to a printer
Copy & Paste
Sending files between different machines
Using the FRS to cycle through open programs.
contribution_desc:
The paper provides a technique to "grab" a file from one computer and "drop" it onto another via a hand gesture pointed towards the sending/receiving computer. The fist-gesture is detected via 4 force resistive sensors (FRS) and the target computer communicates with the wristband via ultrasonic signals. 
The files are copied via a Github repository and the gesturer are equivalent to a git push and git pull.
tracking_characteristic: Identity; Tracking users only; Inside-out tracking
additional_hardware: Force resistive sensor; Ultrasonic transmitter and receiver; Arduino
fabrication: Wristband (fabric) and lasercut holder for receiver
